mapper.select: SELECT reg_no, member_id, member_password, authority_level, member_name, member_email, member_mobile, DATE_FORMAT(last_login_dt, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') AS last_login_dt FROM members WHERE member_id = #{id} AND is_deleted != 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO members ( member_id, member_password, authority_level, member_name, member_email, member_mobile, reg_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{enc_password}, #{authority_level}, #{name}, #{email}, #{mobile}, NOW() )
